document.full_text: the united states defense secretary prodded germany and poland to join the effort and asked the netherlands, spain and turkey ' whose warplanes are not striking ground targets ' to do more.
document.title: nations bombing libya ask for help amid strain
lines_and_colors: the united states defense secretary prodded germany and poland to join the effort and asked the netherlands, spain and turkey ' whose warplanes are not striking ground targets ' to do more.
